entry.content: Image: Polygon Are colors even real? Many boardgames in the party game genre like to test the players knowledge with trivia or social deduction. It‚Äôs all in good fun, but there are objectively correct answers. That immediately makes Hues and Cues a different experience, because this game is all about the subjective task of describing a color. What specific shade of yellow is a school bus?
